cause.description:
The Humane Society works to reduce suffering and to create meaningful social change for animals by advocating for public policies to protect animals, investigating cruelty and working to enforce existing laws, educating the public about the issues, and conducting hands-on programs, such as assisting animals when disasters strike.
1. All animals deserve to have a loving home.
2. Pets are not commodities that can simply be disposed of if owners no longer want them.
cause.mission: help find homes for those pets who no longer have them.
cause.name: Find Forever Homes
